name: part_002
file: tmp_【#夏色まつり生誕祭】4回目のバースデー♪【ホロライブ⧸夏色まつり】 [C-J0mGVamNc]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: Natsuiro Matsuri performs the song "No.1" during her 4th birthday celebration live stream.

subtitles.original:
No.1
作詞：shito, Gom 作曲：shito
subtitles.english:
No.1
Lyrics: shito, Gom / Composition: shito

subtitles.original: ごめん、憧れてた 追いかけてた
subtitles.english: Sorry, I was longing for it, chasing after it.

subtitles.original: いつまでもそうでいたかった
subtitles.english: I wanted to stay that way forever.

subtitles.original: 完璧なあなた嫌いになった
subtitles.english: I grew to hate your perfect self.

subtitles.original: 同じように愛もらって育ったのに
subtitles.english: Even though I was raised with the same love,

subtitles.original: いつからか差が開いてた
subtitles.english: at some point, a gap opened up.

subtitles.original: 八つ当たりだってしたかったね
subtitles.english: I wanted to take it out on you, didn't I?

subtitles.original: Maybe 神様は試練与えた 強く慣れよと
subtitles.english: Maybe God gave me a trial, telling me to become stronger.

subtitles.original: うざい平等なんて嘘つき 分かってるけど
subtitles.english: I know "annoying equality" is a lie, but...

subtitles.original: 可愛いとか持てたいとか 諦めないの女の子だし
subtitles.english: Being cute, wanting to be popular... I won't give up, I'm a girl after all.

subtitles.original: 可愛く 猫被り ナンバーワンだよ
subtitles.english: Acting cute and innocent, I'm number one.

subtitles.original: 愛してね 生き方は 無限にある
subtitles.english: Love me, okay? There are infinite ways to live.

subtitles.original: お父さんの大袈裟な言葉
subtitles.english: My dad's exaggerated words...

subtitles.original: いじらしく 猫被り 私らしく行く
subtitles.english: Adorably innocent, I'll go my own way.

subtitles.original: 暇じゃない人生生きよ
subtitles.english: Let's live a life that's not boring.

subtitles.original: だって理想言えばキリがなくて
subtitles.english: Because if I talk about ideals, there's no end to it.

subtitles.original: 無いもの全部欲しがって
subtitles.english: Wanting everything I don't have,

subtitles.original: 鏡を見たって溜息 はぁ...
subtitles.english: I look in the mirror and sigh, "ha..."

subtitles.original: あなただって悩んでいた 知らなかった
subtitles.english: I didn't know you were worrying too.

subtitles.original: みんなと同じだったとした
subtitles.english: Assuming you were just like everyone else,

subtitles.original: ピンと張った糸 緩んでいく
subtitles.english: the taut string begins to loosen.

subtitles.original: Maybe 神様は楽しんでる 予測できない人を
subtitles.english: Maybe God is enjoying people who are unpredictable.

subtitles.original: 私はそれ以上に 楽しんでやるぜ
subtitles.english: I'm going to enjoy it even more than that!

subtitles.original: 勉強とかお仕事とか 諦めないの女の子だし
subtitles.english: Studying, working... I won't give up, I'm a girl after all.

subtitles.original: 元気よく 挨拶よく たまには不意に付いてきて
subtitles.english: Energetic, good with greetings, sometimes follow me unexpectedly.

subtitles.original: 愛した分 愛されるの お母さんがくれたアドバイス
subtitles.english: You'll be loved as much as you love, that's the advice my mom gave me.

subtitles.original: 張り切ってミスしても 私らしく行く
subtitles.english: Even if I'm eager and make a mistake, I'll go my own way.

subtitles.original: 胸張って生きる
subtitles.english: Live with your head held high.

subtitles.original: さらけ出せば 心が温かてれたんだ
subtitles.english: If I lay it all bare, my heart would be warmed.

subtitles.original: 好きに言ってろ 痛くない
subtitles.english: Say what you want, it doesn't hurt.

subtitles.original: 神様は夢与えた 変われるために
subtitles.english: God gave me a dream so that I could change.

subtitles.original: サンキュ 乗ってやるよ 最後まで付き合ってもらうよ
subtitles.english: Thank you, I'll take you up on that, stay with me until the end.

subtitles.original: 雨は止んで傘を閉じた 今まで見えてなかった景色
subtitles.english: The rain stopped and I closed my umbrella, seeing views I couldn't see before.

subtitles.original: 透明が反射して世界を照らした
subtitles.english: Transparency reflected and illuminated the world.

subtitles.original: 胸躍る 可愛いとか持てたいとか 諦めないの女の子だし
subtitles.english: Exciting! Being cute, wanting to be popular... I won't give up, I'm a girl after all.

subtitles.original: 可愛く 猫被り ナンバーワンでしょ
subtitles.english: Acting cute and innocent, I'm number one, right?

subtitles.original: 愛してね 生き方は無限にある
subtitles.english: Love me, okay? There are infinite ways to live.

subtitles.original: お父さんの大袈裟な言葉
subtitles.english: My dad's exaggerated words...

subtitles.original: いじらしく 猫被り まつりらしく行く
subtitles.english: Adorably innocent, I'll go Matsuri's way.

subtitles.original: 暇じゃない人生生きよ
subtitles.english: Let's live a life that's not boring.
